CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 8, 1951, pg. 7 reads: "Freed by Jury - Although exonerated by a Criminal Court jury last Friday of beating and robbing a white Dormont nurse, Jack Hardine of Burrows Street shields his face from the cameraman as he leaves Judge Harry M. Montgomery's courtroom. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Man escorting Jack Hardine after leaving Judge Harry M. Montgomery's courtroom, in Allegheny County Courthouse
